description.en:
Daily Chaldea is an unofficial daily slice-of-life fancomic created using art assets from the game Fate/Grand Order and building upon the existing lore of the franchise.

The story follows the adventures of genderswapping protagonist Ritsuka Fujimaru and the many Servants they've summoned, with the tone ranging from comedic to philosophical. The comic is 'live' with the NA server of Fate/Grand Order, with new characters appearing in the comic around the time they appear in the game and comics often referencing recent events in the game.

Enjoyment of this comic relies heavily upon the reader's familiarity with the game and its characters, so the author recommends playing Fate/Grand Order before reading this comic.

---

This comic is being uploaded to MangaDex by reader request and with the approval of MangaDex staff. All art is copyright TYPE-Moon / FGO Project, Aniplex Inc., Lasengle, and other copyright holders as appropriate. This comic is not for profit (through ad revenue or otherwise).

Some early use the original white backgrounds. Later comics have darker backgrounds and additional art assets for improved quality.

description.en: This unusual duo brings the hidden truth into the light! Ron Kamonohashi, a private investigator with serious issues, and Totomaru Ishiki, a pure-hearted but dim police detective, team up to solve the most baffling mysteries!
description.es: ¡Esta pareja de detectives formada por Ron Kamonohashi, un investigador poco ortodoxo, e Isshiki Totomaru, un policía de carácter puro e inocente, deberá resolver el misterio para sacar a la luz una verdad que lleva mucho tiempo enterrada bajo una terrible oscuridad! ¡De la mano de la autora de Katekyo Hitman Reborn y Éldlive llega esta vertiginosa historia de misterios y detectives!
description.ja: かつて、探偵養成学校BLUEで、解けない謎はない天才と呼ばれ、自らも類稀なる才能を生涯探偵に捧げると宣言した男・鴨乃橋ロン……しかしロンは探偵として致命的な欠陥をかかえていた!!　事件解決率100％！　犯人検挙率0％!?　訳あり探偵・鴨乃橋ロンがピュアでマヌケな捜査一課の刑事・一色都々丸と鮮烈に謎を解き明かす！
description.ru: Этот необычный дуэт раскроет все тайны! Захватывающий детектив нового поколения от Акиры Амано, создателя "REBORN" и "ēlDLIVE"!!
description.pt-br: Essa dupla inusitada trará a verdade escondida para a luz! Ron Kamonohashi, um investigador privado com sérios problemas, e Totomaru Isshiki, um policial de caráter puro e inocente, se juntam para resolver os mistérios mais enigmáticos possível! Uma emocionante historia de detetive de uma nova geração de Akira Amano, criadora de “Reborn!” e “ēlDLIVE”!

description.en:
For your very average high school girl, Tsukushi, there's her cool and beautiful childhood friend (with some very particular weaknesses) Hinoka. Tsukushi always thought they would be normal childhood friends forever… That is until Tsukushi saw Hinoka rejected her confession in a dream.   The hypnagogic romantic comedy between a cheery maiden, and a cool girl which begins with a dream, starts right now!

 [Serialization of Popular Twitter manga by Hijiki](https://mangadex.org/title/088db207-6c42-4fa9-9e6f-1b831c21c1ac/a-yuri-manga-that-starts-with-getting-rejected-in-a-dream)
description.id: Tsukushi bermimpi ditolak saat menyatakan cintanya pada sahabatnya, Hinoka. Satu mimpi yang akan selalu menghantuinya, dan membuatnya mulai melihat Hinoka dengan cara yang berbeda.

altTitles.ja-ro: Madan no Ichi

description.en: In this world, witches must hunt down their magic! Deep in the forest, the terrifying king of magic and the strongest witch are locked in deadly combat. But suddenly, a young boy joins the fray. His name is Ichi and he is just a hunter. But he has the power to flip the magic world upside down in this magic hunting fantasy epic!
description.ru: В этом мире ведьмы охотятся за своей магией! В глубине леса ужасающая маджика и сильнейшая ведьма схлестнулись в бою не на жизнь, а на смерть. Но вдруг к битве присоединяется молодой парнишка. Его зовут Ити, и он обычный охотник. Но у него есть сила перевернуть весь мир магии с ног на голову в этом эпохальном магическом фэнтези об охоте!
description.pt-br: Neste mundo, as bruxas devem caçar sua magia! Nas profundezas da floresta, o terrível rei da magia e a bruxa mais forte estão presos em um combate mortal. Mas, de repente, um jovem garoto se junta à briga. Seu nome é Ichi e ele é apenas um caçador. Mas ele tem o poder de virar o mundo mágico de cabeça para baixo neste épico de fantasia de caça mágica!

description.en:
A necromancer is a profession considered the noble of nobles, with less than 1,000 in the population worldwide! I was born with a diamond spoon, no, a necromancer spoon in my mouth! 

... Or so I thought. 

"I’m just a defective necromancer." 
*Using skill, [Summon Ordinary Skeleton (E-Rank)].*

You'd think a necromancer should be able to summon liches, Dullahans, or death knights. But nope, I can only summon skeletons. But then one day, suddenly… 

[Hidden condition achieved!]
[Condition: The 10,000 Uses Rule]
[Your rank has upgraded to D-rank!] 

I achieved the hidden condition and gained the ability to raise my skeletons. From E-rank to S-rank! 

The story of Joo Donghoon unfolds, the world's only cursed necromancer, who’s speeding toward becoming a ranker!

description.en: The second spring at the Advanced Nurturing High School is welcoming Ayanokoji and Class D. The special exams aren't only what awaits them, but the unique freshmen as well. Kazuomi Hōsen and Ryūen. The two who shared the bad reputation between themselves during Ryuen's middle school days. Takuya Yagami, who proclaims to come from the same middle school as Kushida, is approaching her. And the capricious Ichika Amasawa who is pulling Ayanokoji left and right.
description.pt-br: A cortina sobe e o arco do segundo ano dessa série extremamente popular começa!Quando Kiyotaka Ayanokouji e seus colegas de classe começam seu segundo ano, mudanças são vistas em toda a Tokyo Metropolitan Advanced Nurturing High School. Com a graduação do terceiro ano e a entrada do primeiro ano na escola, as alianças estão bem encaminhadas. Além disso, agora que Miyabi Nagumo é o presidente do conselho estudantil, a promessa de transformar a escola em uma baseada meritocracia pode se tornar uma realidade. Enquanto isso, os conflitos entre as classes continuam a crescer à medida que o total de pontos da classe se aproxima. Com outro exame especial se aproximando, Ayanokouji permanecerá nas sombras, ou ele finalmente entrará nos holofotes e ajudará sua classe a subir para a ilustre Classe A?

description.en:
An unknown skill turns into unlimited power with divine knowledge [Internet]!

"To manifest an SSS rank with the weakest skill is a disgrace!"

Rona is a girl who was expelled from her home due to her lack of money, food, and power. Lost and hopeless, she suddenly hears the words...

"Would you like some guidance?"

She discovers how to utilize her unique SSS rank skill: [Internet], which she alone possesses. The true nature of this skill is the ability to access this world's 'guide sites' - an extraordinary cheat skill! Endless production of valuable items! Acquiring ultra-rare equipment! Thanks to her skill, she can do as she pleases...!
description.ja:
「…攻略うぃき？」――最弱クラスのスキルを発現してしまい追放された少女・ローナ。しかしそのスキルの正体は、この世界の『攻略サイト』を見ることができるＳＳＳランクのチートスキル【インターネット】だった！

（１）冒険開始→（２）即・最強武器発見→（３）世界を混乱に陥れる最強少女に‥‥‥。ローナは言う。「私はただ、平和に自由に生きたいだけなのにいぃ‥‥‥！」

altTitles.ja: クベーラ

description.en:
Gods with everlasting lives. Sura who possess unrivaled power. And humans, caught helplessly in-between.  
When Kubera's peaceful village meets its fiery end, a mysterious magician named Asha comes to her rescue. Together they begin a journey in search of answers and revenge. Meanwhile across the realms, a web of entwined fates is growing tighter. One by one the other players of the game will emerge, each with their own agenda to pursue.  
At the center of this maelstrom stands Kubera, the girl with a god's name. Will this sixteen-year-old be the salvation of the world or its destruction?
description.it:
Dei immortali. Sura dai poteri impareggiabili. E gli umani, che si ergono fra loro impotenti.  
Quando il pacifico villaggio di Kubera incontra la sua fine, una misteriosa maga di nome Asha accorre in suo soccorso. Insieme intraprendono un viaggio in cerca di risposte e vendetta. Mentre attraversano il regno, una rete di destini intersecati sta nascendo… Una ad una le altre pedine della scacchiera emergono, ognuna all'inseguimento dei propri obiettivi.  
Al centro di quest'uragano si trova Kubera, la ragazza con il nome di un Dio. Questa sedicenne sarà la salvatrice di questo mondo… o la sua distruttrice?
description.pl:
Bogowie z nieśmiertelnymi żywotami  
Asury z niepojętą mocą  
I ludzie, pomiędzy nimi.  
Gdy wioska Kubery zostaje zniszczona, tajemniczy mag przychodzi jej na ratunek. Razem wyruszają w podróż w poszukiwaniu odpowiedzi i zemsty. Tymczasem pomiędzy wymiarami pajęczyna przeznaczenia coraz ciaśniej zaciska się… Jeden po drugim nowi gracze wkraczają na scenę, mając swoje własne powody. Historia młodej dziewczyny, która traci wszystko i zaczyna żyć zemstą.

altTitles.ja: Ueki no Housoku
うえきの法則

description.en:
A group of powerful beings called tenkaijin are holding a special tournament. The rules of the game–each tenkaijin selects a kid in junior high to be his champion and grants him a special power. The kids take each other on in heated battle, but if they hurt innocent bystanders, then they lose one of their natural-given abilities. Every time they win a battle, they gain a new ability. The ultimate winner of the tournament is granted any power of his choosing, and the tenkajin who he represents succeeds in becoming the next god. Kosuke Ueki has been chosen to fight in the tournament. His special power–the ability to turn garbage into trees.


---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media as **The Law of Ueki** (2006)

description.en: By the will of the goddess, Itsuki Shinomiya was given the privilege of choosing various abilities and being reborn in another world. However, before going to the other world, he didn't want to involve himself in scary, dirty, gross things like battles. Fiercely determined to live a slow life, he chose the unique skill [Pocket Money], giving him an amount of money once per day. "With this, I can hang out with girls without having to work!" Dreaming of avoiding battles and living with cute girls, Itsuki stepped into the other world! But the reality was not that simple. Getting attacked by giant bugs, getting caught up in arguments at the guild, and getting stuck with slaves?! In the end, will Itsuki be able to live his ideal slow life?! Using unique skills and manufacturing skills, an exciting other-world slow life with beautiful girls starts now! (hopefully)
description.ja:
異世界での第二の人生は…とにかく楽したい!!

忍宮一樹――心も身体もすり減らして働くサラリーマンは、夢のスローライフを目指して異世界へと降り立った。だが、夢の実現のための切り札、一日一回お金を生み出せる『お小遣い』スキルでは全く足りず、やむなく働くハメに。なんとか“錬金術師ギルド”に就職し、スローライフの第一歩…と思いきや、営業先の“冒険者ギルド”では難癖をつけられてしまう。さらには美女から「あなたの奴隷になる」と宣言され大混乱！ どうなる俺の異世界ライフ!?
description.pt-br: Pela vontade da deusa, Itsuki Shinomiya recebeu o privilégio de escolher várias habilidades e renascer em outro mundo. No entanto, antes de ir para o outro mundo, ele não queria se envolver em coisas assustadoras, sujas e grosseiras como batalhas. Ferozmente determinado a viver uma vida lenta, ele escolheu a habilidade única [Pocket Money], dando a ele uma quantia em dinheiro uma vez por dia. “Com isso, posso sair com as garotas sem precisar trabalhar!”. Sonhando em evitar batalhas e viver com lindas garotas, Itsuki entrou no outro mundo! Mas a realidade não era tão simples. Ser atacado por insetos gigantes, se envolver em discussões na guilda e ficar preso a escravos? No final, Itsuki será capaz de viver sua vida lenta ideal? Usando habilidades únicas e habilidades de fabricação, uma emocionante vida lenta de outro mundo com lindas garotas começa agora.

Nascida como filha de uma Concubina de Status baixo

description.pt-br:
Quando abri meus olhos, eu era uma princesa.

Eu renasci como uma princesa, não uma princesa, em Joseon, mas uma visão de mundo longe da história real sem nenhum trabalho duro para assistir ao drama histórico.

Eu nasci como filha de uma concubina júnior, então eu só queria viver uma vida tranquila, mas não posso, então...

Eu empurrei Youngbin e seu filho que estavam mirando em um assento vazio no meio do campo... !

E percebi que este mundo é semelhante aos romances que li antes!

O fato de que o chefe final, não, o vilão Youngbin e seu filho Kyung-eon-gun enquanto eu que estava na 1ª posição extra, de alguma forma os havia removido!

Graças a isso, o príncipe herdeiro que de outra forma teria sido morto ainda está vivo, e o grão-príncipe, que deveria ter sido desconfiado como um príncipe herdeiro depois de sofrer uma batalha sombria, ainda está intacto!

Eu me pergunto se isso está certo...
Estava longe do conteúdo do romance, mas eu queria viver uma vida pacífica e agradável...
As coisas no mundo nem sempre saem como planejado.

***

"Ok. Sia, você não queria ver seu pai?"

"Sim."

Para ser honesto, eu via meu pai biológico com bastante frequência.

"Abama, eu acho que a irmã é um gênio."

"Certo?"

O príncipe herdeiro Jawa, que é gentil, bonito e até um salva-vidas, mas é um tanto indiscutível.

"Peça desculpas. Você fez algo ruim na frente dos gatinhos."

"?"

O menino é legal, mas um pouco irritante até mesmo seu irmão mais velho, que tem seis anos de diferença.

Eu sei que é difícil para todos...
mas se você precisa de cura, crie um cachorrinho ou tenha um filho...

"No Rio Hangang, estudiosos confucionistas flutuam barcos e observam as flores, e dizem que é lindo."

"Eu não sabia que existia tal coisa. Eu quero ver isso algum dia." "

Nós iremos ver isso mais tarde."

Essa criança está flertando comigo agora?

Akito is puzzled, but ends up filming it with his smartphone. Kaho notices Akito, and in the men's restroom, makes a "proposal" to Akito! Exposed high school girl and movie boy.

description.en:
The protagonist, a university student named Kazuya Hayakawa woke up one day with a message window that shows up in his field of view. This window is always visible to him, and when certain lines are displayed in it, he gets thrown into confusion.

From that day onward began Hayakawa's daily ordeal of getting manipulated by this message window.

(Source: Amazon JP)

description.en:
The Adresia empire on the Vogel continent. There is a battle over the throne of such an empire that possesses powerful military and vast territory. With the successor undecided, the children of the emperor are vying to expand their power. However, there was one prince that everyone says will definitely not become the emperor. The seventh prince, Arnold Lakes Adler. The young man who was inferior to his younger twin brother in every way, the dull prince.

Incompetent and lethargic, Arnold wastes everyday just playing around. However, behind the scenes, he is one of the only five SS-Class adventurers called 'Silver'. Seeing the intensifying battle for the throne he decided "I don't want to die so let’s have my little brother become the emperor..."
description.ja: 「出涸らし皇子」と帝国中から馬鹿にされる無気力皇子・アルノルト。しかし実は、禁忌の古代魔法を操るＳＳ級冒険者・シルバーという裏の顔を持つ最強皇子だった!?

description.en:
A sweet essay by a real-life couple, that attracted a lot of attention on SNS, is now being serialized on Yuri-Hime!

Koharu and Minato are a long-distance couple who finally got the chance to live together. Their lovey-dovey daily life, even with a 10-year age difference, will heal you from the fatigue of modern life...!
description.es-la: El dulce ensayo de una pareja real, que está causando sensación en las redes sociales, comienza a ser serializado en Yuri Hime! Koharu y Minato, una pareja a larga distancia, empiezan a vivir juntas, cumpliendo su sueño. La vida amorosa de estas dos chicas con una diferencia de edad de 10 años, ¿¡será un remedio eficaz para el cansancio diario de la vida moderna...!?
description.pt-br:
Um doce ensaio de um casal da vida real, que atraiu muita atenção no SNS, agora está sendo serializado na Yuri-Hime!

Koharu e Minato são um casal distante que finalmente teve a chance de morar juntos. Seu cotidiano amoroso, mesmo com 10 anos de diferença de idade, vai te curar do cansaço da vida moderna...!

災悪のアヴァロン～ゲーム最弱の悪役デブに転移したけど、俺だけ“やせれば強くてニューゲーム”な世界だったので、最速レベルアップ＆破滅フラグ回避で影の英雄を目指します～

description.en:
The main character loves the MMORPG game called Dungeon Explorer Chronicle (Dun-Ex). During one particular day, a beta test event was announced, and he managed to beat it.
In exchange for clearing the event, he was granted permission to try the beta test server.
Forcing to choose different avatar and skill as the system doesn't allow his own, he eventually settled on random. However, he is transferred to a place where, as expected, he finds a fat, villainous mob character...!

altTitles.ja: お嬢様はロイヤル・シェフ

description.en:
Sena’s been tossed into another world, as the despised daughter of a noble family. Her little restaurant was her refuge in her last life, so she’s got some tricks up her sleeve—cooking skills! 

As Senianna, she’ll put her brains and fine-tuned taste buds (Korean fried chicken, anyone?) to the test so she can take back the kitchen and gain this society’s esteemed title of Chef Royale. Will her cuisine reign supreme over the empire and bring her the sweet and salty balance of power and affection?

---

[Original Webtoon](https://page.kakao.com/home/55268483)

Official Translations:

* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.podoteng.com/)
* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/Royal-Chef-Lady/3380)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/46395)
---
As a chef at a small knight's restaurant, I became the nuisance youngest daughter of a powerful man who was afraid of the emperor. I tried to run away with all my travel expenses…

It’s strange.

“If you say you're sorry, are you that shameless?”
“That’s because I’m your brother.”
“Why don't you take Grandmother on a stroll?”

Why is everyone so nice to me all of a sudden?

“Why do you want to take out someone's eyeballs when they see me?"

People who had caught me trying to escape. I'm just cooking. What's wrong with you?
description.id:
Aku yang dulu hidup dalam penderitaan sewaktu kecil, kini berhasil menjalankan restoran kecil di pinggir jalan dengan guruku yang menjadi orang tua sekaligus teman terbaikku.

Hingga suatu saat, guruku meninggal. Tapi, kemalanganku tidak berhenti di sana. Aku meninggal dan mendapati diriku di dunia lain. Aku kembali hidup sebagai cucu orang paling kuat di wilayah timur?!

Mendapati diriku sebagai Seniana, sekarang aku harus berjuang menjalani hidup dan menjadi royal chef paling hebat!

description.ko:
작은 기사 식당의 요리사였던 나는 황제도 두려워하는 권력가의 천덕꾸러기 막내딸이 되었다.
여비를 저축해 도망치려고 했는데…

이상하다.

"네게 미안하다고 하면 염치가 없는 건가."
"그야 내가 네 오빠니까."
"할애비와 산책해 주지 않는 거냐."

다들 갑자기 왜 잘해 주는 거지?

"너를 보는 놈들의 눈알을 죄 뽑아 버리고 싶은 건 왜일까요."

도망치려는 나와 붙잡는 사람들.
요리만 했을 뿐인데 왜 이러는 거람…

description.en: Aaron Steelegard's fortune was basically set as he discovered a book that allowed him to trade across dimensions—until his enemies take both his life and his riches away. But Aaron is brought back as his younger self, armed with his past knowledge and a chance at revenge! Now free to amass coins, he's gaining powerful abilities and moving up the ranks of the interdimensional trading markets. Will Aaron gain enough coins to survive this journey of vengeance and reclaim his honor?
description.fr: Après avoir perdu toute la fortune de sa famille, un jeune seigneur devient la risée de tous. Pire encore, il tombe dans les mains de son pire ennemi et meurt des tortures qu'on lui a infligées. Au moment il perd connaissance, il se met à regretter toutes les erreurs qu’il a commises et qui l’ont conduite là où il en est… Et là, miracle ! Il se réveille 17 ans en arrière ! Son objectif : faire les bons choix, faire prospérer sa famille et surtout sa richesse et ce, grâce à l’aide d’un artefact magique, le livre de transactions interdimensionnelles !
description.ja:
誇り高きスティルガード家に生まれるも実力不足のまま領主になり、詐欺にあい全ての財産を失ってしまったエルン。暗殺者に死に追いやられるも気がつくと17年前に戻っていた！ 別の次元に住む者と物の取引が可能な家宝「次元取引書」 今度の人生ではなぜか自分の目に映るウィンドウで次元取引ができるようになっていた！？ 「同じ悲劇は繰り返さない」 前世での失敗をもとに怒涛の復讐劇をくり広げていく！

description.th:
เอิร์น สตีลการ์ด ชายหนุ่มที่ต้องพบเจอโศกนาฏกรรมอันน่าเศร้าในวัย 33 ปีจากการถูกหลอกลวงและหักหลัง ได้ย้อนเวลากลับไปยังตอนที่มีอายุเพียง 16 ปี ด้วยความน่าอัศจรรย์ของไอเทมที่ซื้อมาจากการเทรดข้ามมิติ

เขาจึงตั้งปณิธานว่าในชีวิตนี้จะไม่ยอมให้เกิดเรื่องแบบเดิมขึ้นอีก และเขาจะใช้การเทรดข้ามมิติที่มีคอยน์เป็นตัวชี้วัด สร้างอนาคตอันรุ่งโรจน์ให้ได้!
description.zh: 废柴领主艾伦没钱没能力，唯一的武器就是一本书——次元交易书。 在即将被人残忍杀害之际，他凭借“愿望书签”实现了临终愿望，重生回到了过去，而此时的他发现，次元交易书出现在了他意想不到的地方……

description.en: When the ruthless Lord Tiwakan seizes the kingdom of Nauk, Princess Liene Arsac faces an impossible choice: marry her captor or watch her homeland crumble. But Lord Tiwakan isn’t just after power; he desires Liene, and his devotion stirs a mix of fear and undeniable attraction within her. With her former betrothed, Lafitte, still missing, Liene must decide whether to trust Tiwakan's promises or hold out hope for a rescue. As dangerous secrets come to light, Liene’s decision could change the fate of Nauk—and her own heart—forever.
description.pl: Kiedy bezwzględny lord Tiwakan przejmuje królestwo Nauk, księżniczka Liene Arsac staje przed niemożliwym wyborem: poślubić swojego porywacza lub patrzeć, jak jej ojczyzna się rozpada. Ale lord Tiwakan pragnie nie tylko władzy; pożąda Liene, a jego oddanie wzbudza w niej mieszankę strachu i niezaprzeczalnego przyciągania. Ponieważ jej były narzeczony, Lafitte, wciąż jest uznawany za zaginionego, Liene musi zdecydować, czy zaufać obietnicom Tiwakana, czy też mieć nadzieję na ratunek. Gdy niebezpieczne sekrety wychodzą na jaw, decyzja Liene może zmienić los Nauk - i jej własnego serca - na zawsze.

description.en:
Dragon Ball Super follows the aftermath of Goku's fierce battle with Majin Buu, as he attempts to maintain earth's fragile peace.

Having defeated Majin Buu, Goku is starting to get bored with his life on Earth. His wife, Chi-chi, wants him to get a job, but all he wants to do is train and fight stronger enemies. Elsewhere in the universe, the God of Destruction, Beerus, and his attendant Whis are traveling from planet to planet in search of food and entertainment. 

After blowing up some hapless victims, Beerus is reminded of a man from his dreams with the moniker “Super Saiyan God,” or something like that... The God of Destruction sets his sights on Earth to track down this mysterious man! Maybe this will give Goku something to do?
description.pt-br: Dragon Ball Super segue as consequências da batalha feroz de Goku com Majin Buu, enquanto ele tenta manter a frágil paz da Terra.

description.en:
After killing the male lead, the originally innocent girl transformed into a villainess.
Just as she was about to enjoy her newfound freedom, she died a violent death and returned back to the start of the game.
Having carried over with her all the skills she acquired in her previous "playthrough", she was prepared to kill the male lead again; however, the current circumstances seem a bit... strange?
description.ru:
Убив главного героя, девушка становится монстром в глазах других, но, собираясь насладиться свободой, трагично погибает и оказывается в начале игры. Сохранив знания и навыки из прошлой жизни, она собирается повторить своё убийство, однако происходящее кажется немного… странным.
«Да кто же ты такой?!»
description.zh: 杀死男主角后，原小白花女二黑化成了女魔头，正当她快意江湖的时候却暴毙回到游戏的开头。继承了上周目所有能力的她准备先下手为强再次杀死男主，只是现在的情况好像有点……意外？ “不对，你到底谁啊——？！”

description.en:
Taepung Shin knows every nook and cranny of his favorite MMO video game Paradiso like it was the back of his hand! However, his gaming adventures suffer an abrupt end after his untimely death. But this is not his last hurrah since he’s reincarnated as Jared, a delinquent lord of a frozen province… in Paradiso! Now, he must brave the world he loved and take advantage of all glitches he knows about and turn himself into the main character of his new solo adventure!

description.fr:
Trop d’heures sup + un jeu vidéo non-stop = game over, décès assuré ! Ce qu’il n’avait pas prévu, c’est de se réveiller dans son jeu vidéo favori… en tant que roi inconnu d’un fief carrément à la dérive. Pas grave, en tant qu’expert du jeu, il va pouvoir utiliser tous les bugs pour s’améliorer, tout ça en un rien de temps ! Et surtout, être sûr que son royaume (et lui accessoirement) survivra lorsque la “Grande Guerre” éclatera.

과도한 업무와 밤샘 게임으로 돌연사?!
눈을 뜬 나를 반긴 것은 게임 <파라디소>의 세계관 속이었다.

그것도 초고도비만의 몸뚱이와 몰락하기 일보직전의 완벽한 듣보잡 엑스트라 영주. 자레드의 몸으로 환생했다!

망할! 소설이나 영화 속 주인공들은 존잘남으로 태어나서 호의호식하며 잘 살던데!

“반드시 정점을 차지하겠어!”

성공하고 성장 할 수 있다면!
버그든 꼼수든 무엇이든 OK!

자레드의 혹독한 다이어트와 버그로 꿀빠는 치열한 현생 도전기가 시작된다!

description.th:
เมื่อเซียนเกม 'พาราดิโซ' อย่างผม โหมงานและเล่นเกมอย่างหนักจนต้องมาจบชีวิตจากการพักผ่อนน้อยนั้น ได้มาถือกำเนิดขึ้นมาใหม่ในร่างของ 'จาเร็ด' ท่านลอร์ดแห่งอาณาจักรคลิเวียที่อยู่ในเกมพาราดิโซ

ทว่าร่างกายของผมในตอนนี้เป็นร่างตุ้ยนุ้ย ไม่เอาการเอางานจนอาณาจักรเละเทะ และความซวยสุดๆ อยู่ที่ในอีก 10 ปีให้หลัง จะมีมหาศึกเทพชนมารอุบัติขึ้น ที่ทำให้ทั่วทั้งทวีปตกอยู่ในความโกลาหล

การจะลดความอ้วนและเพิ่มความแข็งแกร่งให้กับตัวเองภายในเวลาอันสั้นนั้นไม่มีทางเป็นไปไม่ได้แน่! นอกจากจะใช้บั๊กและสูตรโกงจากในเกมมาช่วยทำให้ผมกลายเป็นผู้กล้าที่แข็งแกร่งที่สุดในทวีปได้ยังไงล่ะ!

altTitles.ja: T・Pぼん

altTitles.ja-ro: TP Bon

description.en: There exists a secret organization that has members traveling across time to save people from their wrongful deaths. Bon Namihira accidentally learn about the Time Patrol, and is recruited as an apprentice member. Together with Ream, the patroller in charge of mentoring him , Bon goes to various historical periods to rescue innocent people, trying not to alter history in the process.

altTitles.ja: ふつうの軽音部

altTitles.ja-ro: Futsuu no Keionbu

altTitles.fr: La fille qui découvre le rock !

description.en: With a passion for richly textured Japanese rock, first-year high school student Chihiro Hatono steps into the world of the light music club, new guitar in tow. But what awaits her behind those doors...? A drama of unfiltered youth and musical ambition takes the stage!
description.es-la: Chihiro Hatono, estudiante de primer año de preparatoria y apasionada por el rock japonés se adentra en el mundo del club de música ligera con una nueva guitarra a cuestas. Pero, ¿qué le espera tras esas puertas...? ¡Un drama sobre juventud sin filtros y ambición musical toma el escenario!
description.pt-br: Com uma paixão pelo rock japonês ricamente texturizado, a estudante do primeiro ano do ensino médio Chihiro Hatono entra no mundo do clube de música leve, com uma nova guitarra em mãos. Mas o que a espera atrás daquelas portas...? Um drama de juventude não filtrada e ambição musical sobe ao palco!

title.en: Isekai de Tochi o Katte Noujou o Tsukurou

altTitles.ja: 異世界で土地を買って農場を作ろう

altTitles.ja-ro: Isekai de Tochi wo Katte Noujou wo Tsukurou

altTitles.en: Let’s Buy the Land and Cultivate It in a Different World

description.en:
Corporate drone Itonami Norio is summoned to another world and granted a powerful skill, [Supreme Wielder], which is invisible to those who summoned him. They’re dismayed to see he’s useless to them, so he asks only for a little plot of land to work for himself.

His skill allows him to use any tool to its greatest abilities, including fishing poles, cooking utensils, and construction tools. When he fishes up a mermaid who wants him for her bridegroom, charms a young dragon with his cooking, and excites an undead king with his rare skill, how long can his quiet country life last?!

altTitles.pt-br: O Imortal mais Preguiçoso da História

description.en: My Grandfather is a Supreme Cultivator, My Second Grandfather is a Top Alchemist, My Father is the Patriarch of an Immortal Clan, My Mother is the Daughter of a Sword Sovereign, My Second Uncle is the Supreme Elder of the Ancient Dao Academy, and My Third Uncle Rules the Western Desert!” Luo Qianfan said to the system, “As the strongest second-generation immortal in history, I’m really not interested in cultivation.
description.pt-br: Meu avô é um cultivador supremo, meu tio é um mestre alquimista lendário, meu pai é o chefe de uma família imortal, minha mãe é filha do Soberano da Espada, meu segundo tio é o mestre supremo do Instituto Taoísta Ancestral, e meu terceiro tio é o governante do Deserto Ocidental! Luo Qianfan disse ao sistema: “Como o mais forte herdeiro imortal da história, eu realmente não tenho interesse em cultivar.”

アンデッドアンラック カラー版

description.en: Fuuko is an UNLUCKY girl that causes bad luck to anyone she touches. As she prepares to face her death, Andy, an UNDEAD who desperately wants to die appears before her! Realizing her potential, he decides to use Fuuko's power to gives himself a permanent death, but then a certain organization goes after them…

altTitles.ja: 新しくできた友達が思ってたのと違った話

altTitles.ja: Omotteta no to Chigau Ano Ko no Hanashi
思ってたのと違うあの子の話

altTitles.en: Story of the girl who is not what I thought she would be.

description.en: First impressions are important, but they're not the whole story...
description.pt-br: A garota que sentada ao meu lado é muito fofa, e isso é muito bom por si só. Mas então eu a conheci fora da escola... OH, MEU!!!

altTitles.ja: やばいアイドルのマネージャーになっちゃった話

altTitles.ja-ro: Yabai Aidoru no Manager ni Nacchatta Hanashi

description.en:
Reluctantly becoming a manager, I was assigned to my first role managing the super popular idol, "Maron," who has a hidden side...

On stage, Maron shines brightly, but in her private life, she's a caring but strange girl who can't give up smoking and requires a lot of attention. As her manager, I have to support her and keep the true face of this "perfect idol" hidden!

An idol with secrets × A caring manager 

Their story begins in the smoking area...
description.ja:
仕方なくマネージャーになって、
初めて担当する大人気アイドル「まろん」には
裏の顔があった...。

舞台上でキラキラしているまろんだが、
私生活ではタバコが手放せない、世話の焼ける変わった女の子。
「完璧なアイドル」まろんの素顔を隠し通すために、
マネージャーとしてサポートしなければ！

裏ありアイドル×世話好きマネージャー
喫煙所から始まる、二人の物語ーー。

title.en: Danshi Kokoseidakedo Gyaru ni TS Shimashita

altTitles.ja: 男子高校生だけどギャルにTSしました

altTitles.ja-ro: Danshi Koukousei Dakedo Gal ni TS Shimashita

altTitles.en: I'm a High School Boy, but I Got Gender-Swapped into a Gyaru

altTitles.pt-br: Eu sou um Garoto do Ensino médio, mas troquei de Gênero e Me Tornei uma Gal

description.en:
Junpei, a loner high schooler, became a gyaru after saving the god of gyaru from drowning. Through his mother's connections, he was able to transfer to an all-girls school, but it was stuffed to the brim with gyarus! Every day is a sensory overload for Shunpei, who's never even talked to a girl, let alone a gyaru.
___
 [Alternative Official Raw (NicoNico)](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/67976)
description.ja: 陰キャ男子・桜井は、目の前で溺れていたギャル神様を助けた恩恵でギャルになってしまった。母親の伝手で転校することができたが、その学校はギャルだらけの女子校だった！ギャルどころか女子とまともに交流したことがない桜井にとって刺激が強すぎる毎日…。
description.pt-br:
Shunpei, um estudante solitário do ensino médio, se tornou uma gal depois de salvar a deusa das gals de se afogar. Através das conexões de sua mãe, ele conseguiu transferir-se para uma escola só para meninas, mas estava cheia de gals!
 Todos os dias são uma sobrecarga sensorial para Shunpei, que nunca falou com uma garota, muito menos com uma gal.
 
 É o início de uma comédia escolar engraçada, com um cara introvertido do ensino médio => transformado em Gal.

altTitles.ja: 仮面ライダーSPIRITS

description.en: After Japanese-American FBI agent Taki Kazuya and Kamen Rider 1 defeat a bat monster, they decide to contact the former riders including Stronger to investigate the appearance of monsters attacking them and civilians. Their investigation reveals the coming of an alien empire out to destroy the Earth, finishing the work that Shocker and other terrorist organizations have failed due to their defeat at the Rider's hands.

altTitles.ja: 僕だけが知ってるんだぜ

altTitles.ja-ro: Boku dake ga Shitterun da ze

description.ja: わけあって高校を転校した平家和玖。転校先の学校で出会ったのは、すごくクールな同級生・小裏さん。有名モデルの姉を持ち、いっさい笑わない彼女は孤高の存在……のように見えたが、ひょんなことから和玖は小裏さんのとびきりの笑顔を見てしまう。和玖の世界は一変する！この笑顔のために……僕はなんだってやるんだ!!『たいようのいえ』のタアモが描く、どきどき＆にやにやが止まらない高校生活！

title.en: Ore no Choukyou Skill ga Nanka Hen

altTitles.ja: 俺の調教スキルがなんか変

altTitles.en: There's Something Wrong with My Training Skills

description.zh: 无法顺利使用调教技能的御兽使阿隆，过着每天都被魔兽欺负的日子。但是在某个契机下他觉醒了自己的技能!为什么这个技能只对女孩子有效？！

altTitles.en: God's Activity in a World Without Gods

altTitles.es-la: Las Acciones de Un Dios en Un Mundo Sin Dioses

altTitles.ja: 神無き世界のカミサマ活動

altTitles.ru: Деятельность Бога в мире без богов

altTitles.zh-hk: 無神世界中的神明活動

altTitles.en: Working for God in a Godless World

altTitles.ja-ro: Kaminaki Sekai no Kamisama Katsudō

altTitles.en: KamiKatsu: Working for God in a Godless World

description.en:
Yukito, the son of a questionable cult leader, lost his life due to the cult's ridiculous training practices. Now to his surprise, he was reincarnated into another world!
It was an ideal world for him without the concept of "God" or "religion" BUT...!

A unique "reincarnating in other world" adventure begins: creating a "religion" in a world without God?!
description.es:
El hijo del fundador de un sospechoso culto, Yukito, pierde la vida por culpa del insensato entrenamiento del culto, pero para su sorpresa, ¡se reencarna en otro mundo!
Era un mundo ideal para él, donde no existía el concepto de "Dios" o "religión"... ¡pero!

Comienza la aventura de una singular "reencarnación en otro mundo" que crea una "religión" en un mundo sin Dios.
description.id:
Yukito, putra seorang pemimpin sekte yang dipertanyakan, kehilangan nyawanya karena praktik pelatihan sekte yang konyol. Sekarang yang mengejutkannya, dia bereinkarnasi ke dunia lain!
Itu adalah dunia yang ideal baginya tanpa konsep "Tuhan" atau "agama" TAPI...!

Petualangan unik "bereinkarnasi di dunia lain" dimulai: menciptakan "agama" di dunia tanpa Tuhan?!
description.ja:
怪しげなカルト宗教の教祖の息子・征人は、教団の無茶な修行で命を落とした――はずが、なんと流行りの異世界転生！
そこは「神」や「宗教」の概念のない、征人にとっては理想の世界だった…が!?
神無き世界で「宗教」を作る異色の“異世界転生”譚、開幕!!
description.ru: Отец Юкито — лидер религиозной секты, который совершил обряд над своим сыном под названием «церемония рождения». Всё ради нового лидера религиозной секты, Юкито! Но что-то пошло не так, и в конце-концов наш герой перерождается в другом мире, где нет таких понятий как: Бог и религия, — а порнографические книги сродни детским каракулям. По мере событий Юкито понимает, что на самом деле в этом мире людскую жизнь и смерть решает империя...
description.es-la: Yukito, el hijo de un sospechoso líder de una secta, pierde la vida durante el peligroso rito de la secta y reencarna en otro mundo. Allí, es salvado por los habitantes de una remota aldea y vive felizmente con ellos. Sin embargo, la aldea es un lugar para aquellos que han sido calificados como "anormales" por el Estado Imperial. Los "anormales" son aquellos que tienen "miedo a la muerte". La gente del Reino Imperial carecía del sentido del "miedo a la muerte". Finalmente, los "anormales" iban a ser ejecutados bajo el sistema de "Condena". Yukito intenta desesperadamente salvar a los habitantes de la aldea, pero es incapaz de hacerlo. En ese momento, "Mitama", el dios del culto del que formaba parte Yukito, es convocado a este otro mundo... ¿Será capaz Yukito de sobrevivir en este otro mundo?
description.pt-br: Yukito, filho de um líder de culto questionável, perdeu a vida devido às práticas ridículas de treinamento do culto. Agora, para sua surpresa, ele reencarnou em outro mundo! Era um mundo ideal para ele sem o conceito de "Deus" ou "religião" MAS...! Uma aventura única de "reencarnação em outro mundo" começa: criar uma "religião" em um mundo sem Deus?!

altTitles.es-la: El camino a casa después de la escuela

altTitles.ja: 放課後帰宅びより

altTitles.pt-br: Viagem para casa depois da escola

altTitles.vi: Câu lạc bộ siêu cấp về nhà

description.en: Shun was invited to the Going-Home Club by Naoki Satou, also known as "Chokki-chan". Despite refusing, he ends up being somewhat forcefully involved in the club's activities! A Going Home Club rom-com featuring a detour-loving high school girl and a new high school student who has lost his dream.
description.ja:
佐藤直希こと“直帰ちゃん”から帰宅部に勧誘された瞬。断ったのに、半ば強引な形で活動に参加させられるハメに！ 寄り道大好き女子高生と夢を失った新入生が紡ぐ帰宅部ラブコメディ！

---

Satō Naoki koto “chokki-chan” kara kitaku-bu ni kan'yū sa reta Shun. Kotowatta no ni, nakaba gōin'na katachi de katsudō ni sanka sa se rareru hame ni! Yorimichi daisuki mesukōsei to yume o ushinatta shin'nyūsei ga tsumugu kitaku-bu rabukomedi!
description.tl: Inimbitahan si Shun sa Klab ng Uwian ni Naoki Satou, na kilala rin bilang "Chokki-chan". Kahit na tumanggi siya, napasama pa rin siya sa mga gawain ng klab sa medyo pilit na paraan! Isang romantikong komedya tungkol sa Klab ng Uwian na tampok ang isang hayskul na dalaga na mahilig maglibot at isang bagong estudyante sa hayskul na nawalan ng pangarap.
description.es-la: Shun fue invitado al Club de Irse a Casa por Naoki Satou, también conocida como "Chokki-chan". A pesar de negarse, acaba involucrándose a la fuerza en las actividades del club. Una comedia romántica del Club de Irse a Casa protagonizada por una chica de preparatoria amante de los desvíos y un nuevo estudiante de preparatoria que ha perdido su sueño.
description.pt-br: Shun foi convidado para o Clube vá-para casa por Naoki Satou, também conhecido como "Chokki-chan". Apesar de recusar, ele acaba se envolvendo de alguma forma nas atividades do clube! Uma comédia romântica do Clube vá-para casa apresentando uma colegial amante de desvios e um novo aluno do ensino médio que perdeu seu sonho.

altTitles.ja: 雨と君と

description.en: On a rainy summer evening, a woman and a "dog" happened to meet each other and life has never been the same since.
description.ja: 雨の降る日に、１人と１匹は出会いました。“あともうちょっと”がほっこり尊いと話題です。
description.ru: В один дождливый день она подобрала что-то похожее на собаку... Давайте же посмотрим, насколько хитрой может быть эта "собака"...
description.pt-br: Em uma noite chuvosa de verão, uma mulher e um "cachorro" se conheceram e a vida nunca mais foi a mesma desde então.

title.en: S-Kyuu Boukensha ga Ayumu Michi: Tsuihou Sareta Shounen wa Shin no Nouryoku 'Buki Master' de Sekai Saikyou ni Itaru

altTitles.en: The Path of an S-Class Adventurer: The Exiled Boy Becomes the World's Strongest With His True Ability, "Weapon Master"

altTitles.ja-ro: S-Class Boukensha ga Ayumu Michi ~Tsuihou Sareta Shounen wa Shin no Nouryoku "Buki Master" de Sekai Saikyou ni Itaru~

altTitles.vi: Sau Khi Bị Trục Xuất, Tôi Trở Thành Mạnh Nhất Thế Giới Với Chúc Phúc "Bậc Thầy Vũ Khí"

altTitles.ja: Ｓ級冒険者が歩む道　 ～追放された少年は真の能力『武器マスター』で世界最強に至る～

altTitles.vi: Hành trình của mạo hiểm giả rank S: Tôi trở thành mạnh nhất thế giới với chúc phúc “Weapon Master”

altTitles.es-la: El Camino del Aventurero de Rango S: El Joven Exiliado se convierte en el más fuerte del mundo con su verdadera habilidad como "Maestro de armas".

description.en: Haise is a young boy who has been gifted with an unknown ability. He becomes an adventurer together with his childhood friend Sasha, but is kicked out of the team for being unable to use his ability and being a hindrance. Furthermore, while continuing his solo adventure, he is caught in a trap and falls into dire straits. Just as he is on the brink of death, Haise's ability "Weapon Master" awakens! It is a power that shakes the laws of the world, summoning weapons from another world! ? An unrivaled fantasy set in another world that begins with adversity!
description.ja: 詳細不明の能力を授けられた少年ハイセ。 彼は幼馴染のサーシャとともに冒険者になるも、能力が扱えず足手まといだとチームから追放されてしまう。 さらに一人冒険者を続ける最中、罠に嵌められて絶体絶命の危機に陥ることに。 死の淵に立たされたその時、ハイセの能力『武器マスター』が目を覚ます！ それは異世界の武器を喚び出すという世界の理をも揺るがす力で！？ 逆境から始まる、異世界無双ファンタジー開幕！

altTitles.ja: 高森くんを黙らせたいっ！！

altTitles.ja-ro: Takamori-kun wo Damarasetai!!

altTitles.en: I Want to Shut Up Takamori-kun!!

altTitles.vi: Đừng nghĩ thế nữa mà, Takamori-kun!

description.en: Minamikawa-san, a girl with the ability to read minds is curious about the boy sitting next to her, Takamori-kun. It's because Takamori-kun's mind is so damn loud...!!
description.ja: 南川さんは隣の席の高森くんの「ヒミツ」を知っている。それは高森くんの心の声が聞こえるということ。そしてさらに、高森くんは南川さんのことが大好きだということ…!!毎日毎日うるさい高森くんの心の声を黙らせられるのか…!?テレパス青春ラブコメ、開幕です!!
description.vi: Một cô gái có khả năng đọc suy nghĩ người khác và cậu bạn kế bên có máu simp lỏ. Điều gì sẽ chờ đợi cả hai phía trước?

description.en:
SMASH LEGENDS is a contest held as a way to resolve a sudden conflict that was brought to the fairy tale world, the Library World.
The fight begins now, where fairy tale characters seeking to achieve their personal goals vie for the fabled prize, “Write-O'-Light”, a fragment of light that holds the power to make one’s wishes come true!
description.ko:
동화 속 세상인 라이브러리 월드에 찾아온 갑작스러운 분쟁을 해결하기 위해 개최된 경기, 스매시 레전드.
우승상품인 소원을 이룰 수 있는 빛의 조각 “라이트 오 라이트(Write-o-Light)를 얻기 위해, 각자의 목표를 이루기 위한 동화 속 인물들의 싸움이 지금 시작됩니다!
description.pt-br:
Smash Legends é um torneio realizado como forma de resolver um conflito repentino que foi trazido para o mundo dos contos de fadas, o Mundo Biblioteca.
A luta começa agora, onde personagens de contos de fadas que buscam alcançar seus objetivos pessoais disputam o lendário prêmio, “A Escrita da Luz”, um fragmento de luz que detém o poder de realizar os desejos de alguém!

description.en:
"Filipino Kaisen" takes place in the same universe as "Jujutsu Kaisen" however the story progresses on a different country named "Philippines" and the story follows the music loving "Juno Coralles"

Everything started when "Guanzon Public Highschool" announced a Field trip for the Grade 11 students specifically in Juno's section, However on the day of field trip before Juno departs his home, Juno's Mother gave him an "Anting - Anting" which is a cursed object and without juno knowing about it he wears it as a souvenir from his mother, then when Juno and his classmates in the Field trip bus are about enter their Destination, Several Cursed spirits disturbed their ride and most of the students were wondering why did the bus stopped, however there were two students who can see the Cursed spirits, which are Juno Coralles and Fred Dadansan, and with the help of the "Anting - Anting" Cursed Object, Juno is able to see cursed spirits, efficiently use Cursed energy and Awaken his Cursed Technique, both of them tried to defeat the cursed spirits and succeeded until a bigger threat arrived and two students from the "Luzon Sorcery Highschool" have arrived and starting here the journey of Juno Coralles in the World Of Sorcerery have Begun.
